krushikarmanthaya saha gowijana sanwardhanaya prawardhanaya kirime aramunin basnahira palatha thula athi wiwidha sankirnathawan hamuwehi pana nagina gatalu saha sima handuna ganima, salasum sakasima, sanyuktha upaya margika piyawara saha prathikarma thula deshiya saha wideshiya welandapala awashyatha sapuralimata hakiwana se gunathwayen ihala nipayum kirima pinisa sulu parimana karmanthakaruwan shakthimath kirima.

shri lankiya sancharaka wyaparaye prawardhanaya sandaha chinaye shanhayi nuwara di pawathwena sancharaka prawardhana wadasatahana ihalama sarthakathwayak laba ganimin mahajana saha paudgalika anshaye ihalama aakarshanaya dina ganimata samathwa thibe.aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen pasugiya 01 da chinaye di arambaunu mema wadasatahana me masa 6 da thek pawathwena athara ee sandaha sancharaka kshethrayata sambandha menma ee kerehi unanduwak dakwana china jathikayan saha anekuth wideshikayan wishala pirisak sahabhagi wana bawa aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya pawasayi.elambaena 2016 wanawita wideshiya sancharakayan laksha 25k shri lankawata genwa ganime ilakkaya jaya ganime aramunin mewani sancharaka prawardhana wadasatahan sanwidhanaya kara thibena athara me wadasatahana pawathwimath samanga wasara awasan wanawita china sancharakayan wishala pirisak shri lankawata genwa ganimata haki wethayi ema amathyanshaya wishwasaya palakarayi.chinaye guwan sewa niyojithayin 200 k me wenuwen sahabhagi wana athara owun saha shri lanka sancharaka niyojithayin athara sruju prawardhana wadasatahan pilibada sakachchawan pawathwena bawada chinaye madhya mangin me prawardhana wadasatahana sandaha wishala pracharayak labadi thibena bawada aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya penwa deyi.elambaena 2016 wanawita china sancharakayin 275,000 k warshikawa shri lankawata genwa ganima me prawardhana wadasatahana mangin apeksha kara thibena athara mita pera ikuth wasare dida bijin nuwara di mewani prawardhana wadasatahanak pawathwini.
